Key Match Events: Darius Garland finished with game highs of 25 points and eight assists
Donovan Mitchell's third-quarter 3-point barrage keyed the decisive run
Jarrett Allen, Evan Mobley and Wade led the Cavaliers' defensive effort on Monday with two blocked shots apiece
Moses Moody led Golden State with 19 points on 7-of-8 shooting from the floor
Jonathan Kuminga recorded 18 points and 10 rebounds in the loss, and Trayce Jackson-Davis grabbed a career-high 16 rebounds to go with his season-high-tying 16 points
Post-Match Reflections: Golden State took its seventh loss in the past nine games
Cleveland, meanwhile, improved to 2-0 on its four-game Western Conference road swing that continues on Tuesday in Los Angeles vs. the Lakers
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cavaliers shot just 33 of 99 from the floor, including 9 of 38 (23.7 percent) on 3-point attempts
Stephen Curry went 4-for-14 and scored just 11 points, his third-lowest output of the season
Others: Cleveland Cavaliers guard Darius Garland (10) reacts during the fourth quarter of an NBA game against the Golden State Warriors at Chase Center
Dean Wade recorded 10 points and 13 rebounds for Cleveland
Ty Jerome added 10 points off the Cleveland bench
